title: unittest: Python's Built-In Safety Net for Developers
author: Jessica Wachtel
description: Python's built-in unittest module provides beginners with an accessible entry point to test-driven development while offering veteran coders a framework to ensure code quality.
cntitle: unittest: Python 开发者内置的安全网
cndescription: Python 内置的 unittest 模块为初学者提供了一个可访问的测试驱动开发切入点，同时为经验丰富的程序员提供了一个确保代码质量的框架。
